channel.title: I got it now thanks davidi2
channel.description:
So i got david scape and everytime i try to change character player rights it resets the charcter how do i fix it so i wont do this and yest i have tried moving ::giveadmin to users and tryed to use it but its like the admin playerrights and the mod p rights arnt added in?
I got it thanks to davidi2

item.title: I got it now thanks davidi2
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“99def, post:7, topic:430857”]nvm thank you very much i was using notepad instead or word pad jw what makes the difference between the 2? btw david you are the best[/quote]I never really looked into it, probably some encoding or file format thing

Read full topic
item.source: I got it now thanks davidi2

item.title: I got it now thanks davidi2
item.dc:creator: @99def 99def
item.description:
@99def wrote:

nvm thank you very much i was using notepad instead or word pad jw what makes the difference between the 2? btw david you are the best

item.source: I got it now thanks davidi2

item.title: I got it now thanks davidi2
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I just retested by downloading it, and it works fine for me.

Again, try wordpad instead of notepad. Or in Login.java, add this somewhere near where it sends the login message:

if(p.username.equals("USERNAMEHERE")) { p.rights = #; //# = 1 for mod, 2 for admin }Then save, compile, and restart the server. Note that is terrible to do, but if it’s all that works for you, I guess it’s a must :\

Read full topic
item.source: I got it now thanks davidi2

item.title: I got it now thanks davidi2
item.dc:creator: @99def 99def
item.description:
@99def wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:430857”]Maybe the source doesn’t have access to the proper folder for some reason?

Also as a small note:
Admin = 2
Mod = 1
for player rights

And make sure if you edit the files, you open them in WORDPAD, not notepad, then save.[/quote]

yeah i know all that ive downloaded your source 5 diff times and it still does the same things

Read full topic
item.source: I got it now thanks davidi2

item.title: I got it now thanks davidi2
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Maybe the source doesn’t have access to the proper folder for some reason?

Also as a small note:
Admin = 2
Mod = 1
for player rights

And make sure if you edit the files, you open them in WORDPAD, not notepad, then save.

Read full topic
item.source: I got it now thanks davidi2
